context: Stock-based compensation The Company recognized $2.3 million, $2.1 million and $1.9 million of stock-based compensation expense for the years ended March 31, 2019, 2018 and 2017, respectively, as follows: Stock-based compensation expense in the years ended March 31, 2019, 2018 and 2017 included $211,000, $207,000 and $150,000, respectively, related to the Company’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan.
